product_name: ErborianYuza Sorbet Eye Radiance Eye Serum
summary: SummaryThe Erborian Yuza Sorbet Eye Radiance Eye Serum is a radiance boosting and hydrating vitamin C eye serum. Enriched with Yuza known for its brightening properties, Yuza Sorbet Eye refreshes and moisturizes the fragile skin of the eye area.
details: DetailsBenefitsAntioxidant propertiesHelps protect the eyes against signs of fatigue, aging and drynessHelps tightening the skin and reduce the appearance of fine linesAids in revealing your natural radiance for a brighter and revived complexionKey IngredientsYuzu: Known for its high Vitamin C content, Yuzu has active properties that moisturizes, antioxidizes and protects skin for a more radiant-looking and stronger-feeling complexion.Item 2624410How To UseAfter cleansing and moisturizer, apply a small amount of your Vitamin C eye cream onto finger and gently pat around the eye area. Can be used in the morning and night.IngredientsAqua/Water, Glycerin, Propanediol, Pentylene Glycol Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Citrus Junos Fruit Extract, Prunus Persica (Peach) Kernel Extract, Cellulose, Polysorbate 60, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/- Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Carbomer, Arginine, Mannitol, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Sorbitan Isostearate, Butylene Glycol, Disodium Edta, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phenoxyethanol, CI 77492/Iron Oxides.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: After cleansing and moisturizer, apply a small amount of your Vitamin C eye cream onto finger and gently pat around the eye area. Can be used in the morning and night.
ingredients: Pentylene Glycol Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract
Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/- Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer

faceoff_positive.comments: I use this during my morning skincare routine, as I ten to use more light products for the day and richer creams for the night routine. This serum is very light and leaves my eyes hydrated and ready for makeup. I love the whole yuzu range available here!
faceoff_positive.headline: Great eye serum

faceoff_negative.comments: I like the feel of the product. It's not greasy and absorbs well.. I didn't quite get the results that I have gotten from some other Erborian products. Over all it's a good moisturizer.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not quite the expected results
